<ce:section-title>Synthesis of dipyrrolidine tartramide-NaI complex (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">A solution of 1.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (4.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) of dipyrrolidine tartramide (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>) in 8.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL of THF and was stirred as 0.6<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) of NaI was added. Then the reaction mixture was stirred overnight during which time a white solid precipitated from the solution. The precipitate collected by filtration and dried <ce:italic>in vacuo</ce:italic>. Recrystallization from acetone/ethyl acetate yielded 0.9<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (90%) of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>NaI<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O as colorless prisms. <ce:sup loc="pre">1</ce:sup>H NMR (CD<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>CN): <ce:italic>δ</ce:italic> 4.56 (d, 2H, |<ce:sup loc="pre">3</ce:sup>
<ce:italic>J</ce:italic>(HH)| 7.5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>Hz, CH), 4.34 (d, 2H, |<ce:sup loc="pre">3</ce:sup>
<ce:italic>J</ce:italic>(HH)| 8.4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>Hz, OH), 3.61 (m, 2H, CH<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N), 3.46 (m, 6H, CH<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N), 2.21 (s, 2H, H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O), 1.92 (m, 8H, CH<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>C). <ce:sup loc="pre">13</ce:sup>C NMR (CD<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>CN): <ce:italic>δ</ce:italic> 170.31 (s, C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 69.97 (s, CH), 47.65 (s, CH<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N), 47.27 (s, CH<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N), 26.85 (s, CH<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>C), 24.46 (s, CH<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>C). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">21</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>NaI: C, 33.98; H, 5.23. Found: C, 34.22; H, 5.23%.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of dipyrrolidine tartramide-NaI complex (2)

A solution of 1.0g (4.0mmol) of dipyrrolidine tartramide (1) in 8.0mL of THF and was stirred as 0.6g (4mmol) of NaI was added. Then the reaction mixture was stirred overnight during which time a white solid precipitated from the solution. The precipitate collected by filtration and dried in vacuo. Recrystallization from acetone/ethyl acetate yielded 0.9g (90%) of 1 ⋅NaI⋅H2O as colorless prisms. 1H NMR (CD3CN): δ 4.56 (d, 2H, |3 J(HH)| 7.5Hz, CH), 4.34 (d, 2H, |3 J(HH)| 8.4Hz, OH), 3.61 (m, 2H, CH2N), 3.46 (m, 6H, CH2N), 2.21 (s, 2H, H2O), 1.92 (m, 8H, CH2C). 13C NMR (CD3CN): δ 170.31 (s, CO), 69.97 (s, CH), 47.65 (s, CH2N), 47.27 (s, CH2N), 26.85 (s, CH2C), 24.46 (s, CH2C). Anal. Calc. for C12H21O5N2NaI: C, 33.98; H, 5.23. Found: C, 34.22; H, 5.23%.
